title: Device for mixing sounds of musical instruments

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a device for mixing sounds of musical instruments, as shown.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of the front, right side and bottom of a device for mixing sounds of musical instruments showing our new design;
FIG. 2 is a front elevational view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a right side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a bottom plan view thereof.
